snippet: Point guard Jeremy Lin, who had surgery April 2 to repair a torn meniscus, is not in game shape, has yet to play five-on-five and has not received medical clearance to return.
abstract: Point guard Jeremy Lin, who had surgery April 2 to repair a torn meniscus, is not in game shape, has yet to play five-on-five and has not received medical clearance to return.

headline.main: Knicks' Lin Has Hurdles to Clear Before a Return
